name: meme-bot
description: Discord Bot that takes a random meme as image from local folder
author: Luc BRUNGARD

scripts.build:dev: npm run commands:delete && npm run commands:register-dev
scripts.build:prod: npm run commands:delete && npm run commands:register-prod
scripts.start:dev: tsc && npm run build:dev && NODE_ENV=development node dist/index.js
scripts.start:prod: tsc && npm run build:prod && NODE_ENV=production node dist/index.js
